website_summaries.verdict: A versatile vacuum that's perfect for cleaning floors and upholstery in smaller homes and apartments.
pros: Dusting brush, upholstery tool, and crevice tool included
Motorized brush roll won't scatter debris around
Powerful suction with no clogged filters
cons: The cord is only 23-feet long, which some find to be too short

customer_reviews.title: Still Searching for perfect Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a good job but I find it difficult to use. I am not strong enough to use the wand with the attachments for over head cleaning. The power head cuts in and out. The cord is too short for my needs. I find it exhausting to use and have ordered an upright with longer cord and lightweight wands that I will be able to operate easier. That being said, it does have good suction and cleans well. It's just not the right vacuum for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Awsome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful vacuum if you have pet hair!! I borrowed my sister's Dyson for "pet hair" to see if it was worth the money. It worked well but I couldn't justify the cost. I purchased this one and to be honest...this one picks up the hair better and actually is easier to use with better attachments for 1/3 the cost. So... if you are on the fence which one to buy...buy this one. It really is an awesome vacuum. No regrets so far!!
customer_reviews.author: TOBY

customer_reviews.title: Junk ! Will not work on carpet!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! The motorized head wont work on carpet. Called bissell they don't take return. They said my carpet is too thick. You can see "'how thick"' my carpet is from picture !! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MingHua G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is one powerful canister vacuum. I use it on ceramic tile, engineered flooring, my carpeted stairs, and on the carpet in my master bedroom. It does a great job on every surface! Powerful suction and easy to empty the canister.
customer_reviews.author: kjGAGirl

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is overpriced and mostly useless after the first use
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK the first time I used it. The second time, it clogged. I have removed and washed all of the filters - they took over a day to dry and don't filter as well. The suction is greatly decreased from the first use such that it barely picks up anything. I tried ordering more filters directly from the company. First they said my order was shipped and on the way, then a week later they said it was not shipped and they have no idea when the filters will be available to ship. This vacuum is overpriced and mostly useless after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: subcultureofone

customer_reviews.title: powerful little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My first use surprised me by the amount of debris I got, I have 2 short haired Boxer mixes and like another reviewer with Dobermans thought my Oreck upright did a good job. I had to empty the canister twice that first time and since then I only empty it when I am finished with my weekly cleaning. I love that I can get rid of the dirt etc. each time instead of storing it in a vacuum bag. The cleaning of the machine is easy and I cannot say enough good about this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Not for households with pets or people with long hair.
customer_reviews.text: After reading most of the reviews and looking at different vacuum cleaners to compare, I thought this would be ideal for my household, but it is not what I had hoped for. After using it three times, I will be returning it and trying something else. The rotating head is always shutting off because hair is wrapped around it, and while the suction is strong enough for sand & lint on the floor, it doesn't pick up dog hair (we have an American bulldog) in our low pile accent rugs. I think this would be a great product for someone that doesn't have pets or anyone with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Demers

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Had an upright for years but it finally died, don't miss the noisy thing at all. The suction for this small unit is good, the beater bar works well. We only have a few throw rugs that need to vacuum and this doses the job very well. There is no reason that this unit shouldn't work well for a small apartment or house with lots of carpet. The downside is the short power cord, and the plastic hose that kinks very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rws

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down on this Bissell Product!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the overall performance of this vacuum. Even though I clean out the vacuum after each use, sometimes when their is a small amount of dirt/dog hair, the cyclone does not spin which makes the vacuum lose suction. The floor piece works good enough, but hair gets stuck in the brushes and is very hard to remove. Also dirt collects above the brushes. The 3-piece tool set is very cheap. I use the brush piece a lot and it is so flimsy which makes it harder to clean woodwork. Also, the cord is not very long, so I added an extension cord to be able to move from room to room (I live in a small apt,).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It replaced an upright, and i love the flexibility, the long hose, the switch at the handle to turn the beater bar off or on, the easy way to dump the canister, and the simplicity of how things go together. I have had units before that were so complicated I had forgotten what and how to take them apart. The self rewinding cord is a pleasure, such a little thing, but very convenient. I highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible on Carpet
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is terrible on carpets. On all our carpets, the rug beater brush stops turning as soon as we place it on the carpet. And it is practically impossible to push the beater forward. The only way to vacuum is to pull the beater toward us Then lift it off the carpet, reposition it, and repeat. Finally, the hose kinks continuously. Overall poor performance - I would not recommend this vacuum for any carpeted areas.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Deckebach

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the best canister vac!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vac with all the stated attachments. Very good suction, never had better! I don't have carpets but it thoroughly got my area this clean, with the attached roller bar. Works great on my hardwoods, and with upholstery attachment, took quick care of my furniture! Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: I dont reccomend
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is difficult to use. The back wheels on the canister part of the vacuum dont roll! Like at all. I have all hardwood floors and I'm literally dragging this piece of junk around cause the wheels dont roll at all. Which makes it very cumbersome. And hurts my back. I wish I bought an upright : / Also, the hardwood floor attachment head amazon recommends to purchase with this vacuum doesn't even fit! They are the exact same diameters and no hose attachment came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gianninoto

customer_reviews.title: Good for wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Great for wood floors. Good for short, thin type carpets (like a mat by the back door). Wouldn’t buy this for plush carpet. Sometimes the main plastic hose gets twisted and interferes with suction. I have to then straighten it out (this is the only frustrating aspect). Not too expensive. Not noisy. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Review

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Does a poor job on hardwood floor but pretty good on carpet. It's a beast to move around you would think it would roll around following you but no you have to keep yanking the canister along. The flexible hose kinks often and you lose suction. You can get under most furniture one of the reasons I purchased it. Would I purchase this again no. Will tey an expensive stick vac next.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: So the vacuum was ok for the first month now it gets clogged every time I vacuum. The suction is not as good as it used to be. But I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: artur

customer_reviews.title: A Vacuum That Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: This powerful little guy is easy to maneuver, lightweight enough to carry when needed and sucks up the dirt! I love the beater brushes that can be utilized or not and the easy empty dirt cup. It is fairly priced (reviewed many vacuums for a lot more $ and less features). Good value, cleaning ability what I anticipated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Packer

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vac! Lightweight powerful suction, easy empty dirt container, easy change from floor to carpet with a touch of a button on the handle, easily change attachments. Hose and wand attach securely to unit without fumbling or disconnecting. Seriously love this vac.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaHope com

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction but hose is flimsy and collapses too easily
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is lightweight and has great suction. The first time I used the carpet vacuuming feature, I was amazed at how much dust and cat hair it picked up that was being left behind with our old vacuum. My chief complaint is the all plastic hose. It has no coil reinforcement so, when maneuvering the vacuum , the hose too easily folds over in half, cutting off the suction. You have to stoop over and rearrange the vacuum and hose to reopen. It would have helped to mention the all plastic hose in the description. Otherwise, a good little vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Canister vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum just wish it was made a little better. The arm of the vacuum isn’t on a swivel knob so you have to move it around instead of it moving with you. The wheels should be swivel wheels as well it flips over if you don’t watch the handle. The cord is a good size but should be longer so you don’t have to unplug as you enter a new room. The positive side the cord has a button that you push and it gathers by itself. The canister is a good size and easy to empty and place back into Position.
customer_reviews.author: Santia  MacWilliams

customer_reviews.title: lightweight vacuum; vacuums like a lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, easy to carry around. Does not have the suction I was looking for but it works well enough for the price. Follow up: I gave this to my son for his apartment which is much smaller and requires less vacuuming. It was not good enough suction for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful
customer_reviews.text: My house is not large but I get tired of lugging a canister or pushing an upright. This little guy is lightweight and very easy to maneuver around the house. The canister removes easily . The only drawback is the length of the cord. It's a little short. However, adding an extension cord solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN C.

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for light cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum dust chamber "full" light comes on when tank only has a little dust in it. Dust chamber could be larger as vacuuming dust off one side of wool blanket filled chamber. Dust chamber opens easily for emptying, but dust doesn't fall out -- manual intervention is required. Power cord winder works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: My vacuum lasted less then 2 months. Have to say that Bissel customer service was amazing and they are sending me a new vacuum but honestly I would prefer to just have my money back if I still had a chance to return it to Amazon. To bad it is to late. :(
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for cleaning in tight and small spaces. Extremely effective cleaning. Easy to carry and move around. The only improvement I could suggest is a light on the carpet attachment for seeing under beds and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months to write a review to make sure it held up. So far so good. This vaccuum is perfect for my apartment - gets in small spaces, easy moving from carpet to hardwood, and awesome suction. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: Love Bissel products but not a fan of this one. Not well thought out. Cord was not long enough. No onboard area for attachments. Canister kept falling over when pulled. Again, not a fan. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hose kinks easily
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about it is that the hose is kind of cheap so it kinks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a an upright only owner. Moving all the heavy parts to be on the floor only was a life saver when I ended up with a herniated disc and couldn’t lift anything
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Arndorfer

customer_reviews.title: Short power cord extremely poor hose quality - amazing cleaning equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The power cord is far too short and the vacuum hose is the cheapest material I’ve ever seen. However the vacuum motor and power beater bar are the best I’ve had since my poor rainbow vacuum died. For a great cleaning you will not go wrong especially with pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: MWG

customer_reviews.title: only works on short carpet - not plush
customer_reviews.text: a really nice and lightweight unit for the price - worked great on my short carpet. But on my medium carpet the motor just caught - does not have a height adjustment. really too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Crotty

customer_reviews.title: One of the best vacuum cleaners I owned. Can even use in the garage.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can use it on a rug or floor; with or without rotating bristles. I use it in my residence. I have a shag carpet so need to turn off bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Geraci

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum - like that you can turn power brush on with button on handle
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum - very happy. I like that you can turn the power brush on with an on/off button on the handle. The only thing I do not like is the very short electric cable, so I always have to use an extension cord. (Our house is not that big just saying)
customer_reviews.author: Petra Jadanowski-Fank

customer_reviews.title: The best choice
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. So easy to reach every spot in my house. Very powerful suction
customer_reviews.author: Zlatka

customer_reviews.title: Filters clog easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Keep looking for a different vacuum. The hose on this vacuum is not made of a durable and pliable material so it will fold and crease while vacuuming. Once it does that, it is there permanently and will keep doing it. The filters will clog quickly, thus affecting the suction power. You'll hear it when the vacuum is turned on. I have stripped this vacuum as much as possible to find out why it keeps doing this, but nothing is stuck anywhere; everything is clear/cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin W. Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is easy to use, has great suction and I can carry it around easily. It works great on hardwood flooring and rugs. I would definitely recommend it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anilem

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum! I’m used to an upright-which stores easily in closet. That’s my only negative about this vacuum....takes up more room in closet. Just a bit awkward to pull behind me as I clean. But overall very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: JLWC

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hard floors and carpet with low pile
customer_reviews.text: Works great on hard floors and carpet with low pile. For carpet, very important to have a motorized brush. Unfortunately, head does not have a pile height adjustment, so doesn't work on high pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: elisabeth Lindemuth

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: SUCH a great investment. So lightweight and easy to push, yet powerful. I used to dread vacuuming, but now it is surprisingly tolerable. Even my 2 year old was able to hold and push the handle, that's how easily it handles!
customer_reviews.author: E. E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have a $50.00 Bissell that I use on my laminate floors that works great. So I bought this one thinking I would get a good vacuum I could use on the bare floors & the carpet also. Third time I used it it just quit. Think it was an electrical issue. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are terrible, they will not roll on a hard surface. The hose kinks too easily. The general shape of the canister makes it catch on furniture or cabinets when pulling it along. The suction is great and the power head lowers almost completely flat to get under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie H.

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT BUY THIS 💩🚽🧻
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks but not like it should.No room for debris to enter canister due to design.Cheapplastic hose is difficult to work with.Power head broke within 2weks.And to top it off, the attachments suggest to buy with it didn’t fit and I had to tape them together!
customer_reviews.author: JETTE

customer_reviews.title: Save your money not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this vacuum it wouldn’t pick up small bird seed....
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We bought this over a month ago. So far we love it. It is light and powerful. So much better than our old machine that broke. We wished we had gotten it earlier. A great vacuum at a great price. We picked this one because it had great reviews on a consumer website that compared a bunch of vacuums. It is better than we expected given the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worthless on new carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Just purchased new carpet in our living room and because the padding is a little thick we can not use the vacuum at all in that room. It works ok on a low pile carpet. Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about the product is that it excellent suction power and it wasn’t too noisy. What I didn’t like is that both the telescopic wand and handle was too heavy. I used it on the hardwood floors throughout the house and the bathroom floor.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Can get under tables and places upright won’t go
customer_reviews.text: I like canister vacuums because it is easy to dump and clear. The attachments for “extra” cleaning duties do not fit ON the vacuum itself. Definitely a minus for this vac
customer_reviews.author: Howard Sample Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great except for ripped up newspaper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for parrot clean up. Clogs repeatedly what vacuuming ripped up newspaper so much my African grey mimics the noise well. For general vacuuming it does awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Frappier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research I selected this Bissell. Was pleasantly surprised at the quality, ease of use and results! Very pleased. Planning on buying one as a gift for my Mom. Well worth spending more for the quality and output.
customer_reviews.author: Catgirl 01520

customer_reviews.title: Solid and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but wife says it's too heavy. It's the lightest full power vacuum I've ever used. Anything lighter sacrifices functionality or sucking power. Also it seems made to last long. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Jared C

customer_reviews.title: A must have little monster
customer_reviews.text: What a little monster this machine is I am so glad I got it great for apts use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: but for a short pile carpet and wood floors it's a great little vac
customer_reviews.text: The hose does seem very thin and flimsy, but for a short pile carpet and wood floors it's a great little vac. I wasn't prepared for having to empty it as often as I do, boy is it small, but size and the job it does makes it worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Nancysrighthere2

customer_reviews.title: Clogs
customer_reviews.text: It is great until it gets clogged. I’ve taken apart, cleaned, replaced filter & now am at a loss. Such a disappointment because I’ve been using only 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Asher

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great. It is light enough to vacuum steps. Easy to empty. Just needs a longer power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Easy to use, empty, and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W. Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this vacuum. Solidly built, excellent suction. Have used it in the basement for heavy cleaning and cleaned the car, on bare floors and rugs, and did a good job. The only complaints I have is the cord is short and it would be handy to have an upholstery tool.
customer_reviews.author: AGranny

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don’t like is the cord is to short, but I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum! It’s so easy to use and has great suction!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Has great suction and very easy to move around in small places
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike, although an added benefit would be light to actually see what you are picking up,just to make sure you don't get any hidden"nasties", like under furniture and beds,,socks do an awful job on a vacuum . A great buy! Honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the attachments that came with vacuum. Very small and cheap. And the diameter of the hose is different from any of my older vacuums so I can't switch out. Otherwise it works well and is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Meerkat

customer_reviews.title: doesn't come with floor attachment
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this canister vacuum would come with a floor attachment. It does not. Now I am trying to find a floor attachment that actually fits and having a hard time. The cord is also very short. Wouldn't but this vacuum again.
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use. Reaches under furniture. Rotating brush. And you can run without brush
customer_reviews.author: Marco Galle

customer_reviews.title: Great lil vaccume
customer_reviews.text: This lil vaccume is great! It has great suction and easy to clean! Only 2 complaints I have is the hose is plastic n flimsy so it kinks easy and you have to re-position it constantly and the cord is not long enough. Other than that it’s been great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. My only complaint would be the maneuverability. It has a tendency to get stuck on the corners of walls and furniture. That being said it’s a great value and really has excellent power and pick-up!
customer_reviews.author: Roger A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bissell maintains my trust in them with this vacuum and it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this vacuum! Great suction, extremely light weight and very quiet. Didn’t wake either of the babies. The cord is kinda short for our big rooms but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: A good vacuum for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice vacuum for the money. Decent suction on carpet and floors. Good price. I wish the cord were longer but it’s a pretty standard length - I just wish the standard length were longer. I would buy it again for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have returned...very poorly made. I have thick plush carpet and it's so hard to vacuum. I really wish we would make things well and to last:(. .
customer_reviews.author: Dillebr

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing vacuum for the price. It is lightweight, has great suction, is super easy to use, and does not clog easily. Finally, I found a vacuum I love.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kristin A. Reale

customer_reviews.title: Great little sucker for the price😋
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry if needed, gets into small places, good suction. Very happy w this compared to my old heavy, bulky one. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy Bissell again
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this vacuum for two years then the motor blew. I think a vacuum cleaner you pay 200.00 for should last longer I will not be buying another Bissell product again.
customer_reviews.author: pam canterbury

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product did not last long. I have two dogs and it’s not good for dog family
customer_reviews.author: akamma parker

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. The hose could be more rubbery and less plastic. Sometimes it folds up on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: No tool holder
customer_reviews.text: Great Vac, just no place to put the 3 attachments!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Never tried it, sending back
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this new, paying full price and was sent a used one. I am returning it as this is filthy and probably filled with germs. It smells horrible. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: catherine weibel

customer_reviews.title: Loses suction fast
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could get my money back. This vac doesn't have good suction at all. I think I'll stick with Meile from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, poor hose design
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed hose. No internal wire to keep hose from kinking onto self and losing suction.
customer_reviews.author: donald a. wieschowski

customer_reviews.title: Small and inexpensive but at a cost
customer_reviews.text: Good little machine. Because it’s so small the retractable cord is short. The hose is not good quality but like the carpet beater brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!!
customer_reviews.text: The various parts attach & detach very easily, and it makes for easy cleaning & storage.
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, easy to set up - all common sense and like most vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa Lamas

customer_reviews.title: Like it worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect cleans well gets anywhere strong suctions and light enough my 3 year old can carry best part handle is higher adjustable so my 3 year old actually uses it to help his mom. I had a really expels nix stain before the one with the ball I like this one a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does  great job.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very powerful and light. Easy to clean canister.
customer_reviews.author: stallionmg

customer_reviews.title: lots of suction
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many vacuums on the market and I have to say this is a great option for this price range. tons of suction!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm.....
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected. The accessories are quite small. There's no attachment for hard surfaces as well as no height adjustment
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works good. Only dislike is it has no carrier for the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Salzer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, not great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It's easy to use, lightweight, the head and wand goes under couches, which is a huge plus. The only thing I don't like is that if you don't have a low pile rug the roller brush will just stop working and you'll have to turn the brush off and back on. I have a shag area rug and it works if you pull the brush head downward only, do not push back up. Not sure if this is a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: A longer AC cord
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is the short AC cord.
customer_reviews.author: John Coppa

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum ,but there is no place to store the attachments! That stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Chan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: amazing  little machine - amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I would like better attachments and more choices for them.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn R. Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, does a great job on any surface!
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on hardwood floors so I'm not sure how well it does on carpets.
customer_reviews.author: denise beede

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The wheels don’t turn very easier on my area rug
customer_reviews.author: Carla O.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vacuum cleaner. Very easy to use and light. Even my 7 year old can vacuum with this!
customer_reviews.author: ndk272

customer_reviews.title: Came in broken
customer_reviews.text: I came in broken the power head would randomly stop spinning.. though I do have to say that the suction was pretty good
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design if you have dogs or cats.
customer_reviews.text: The floor attachment power runs through the suction hose, taking up space in the hose. This provides a perfect place for hair to get stuck while traveling up the hose and soon leads to clogs and a loss of suction. These are very difficult to clean out as the hair is wrapped around the power cord inside the hose. Also, it is not very easy to pull around and we have since thrown it out for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: meatonski

customer_reviews.title: Great unit terrible hose
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit in general. The cup is small but easy to clean out every time I use it. Unfortunately the hose kinks very frequently. This stops the suction on the unit completely. I am sure this will lead to the hose ultimately cracking and needing to be replaced, a rather poor choice for a vacuum cleaner hose. The unit is also not exactly filter free. There are two additional filters. One before the motor and one after. Why aren't both before the motor to protect that as well as keep the room dust free? It seems that the unit is designed to fail.
customer_reviews.author: BreathontheWind

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum based on reviews. Wow, was that a mistake.! I truly Hate this vacuum. It is lightweight, and I do like that.... and I like the size of the power head, But everything else is awful. The cord is short, the hose gets kinked, the dust bucket, well I have to pull the stuff out.! Ugh No side suction, only front.... I will have to replace it, like now.! I thought buy spending a fair amount of money would be beneficial, not In this case for sure.!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, light weight vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheaply made vacuum. It is lightweight, and easy to maneuver. The hose is thin and kinks often. The filter needs to be removed and washed after 4-5 times vacuuming the house, otherwise suction decreases quickly. Cord is short. Does not come with a floor brush. I like canister vacuums, but the power brush, always breaks after a few years and I end up trying a different vacuum which never lasts very long.
customer_reviews.author: jack t piatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Not for a pets household
customer_reviews.text: I wish I saved the money and got a better vacuum. I wish I could return it. It's lightweight and that's cool but no suction or power. I'm super disappointed in whomever compared this vacuum to the Kenmore canister vac. Ugh. For the money I could have gotten my Kenmore fixed. (I was a private housekeeper for ages and the Kenmore can't be beat but I'm not a millionaire and can't afford Miele...so...) I have 3 pets 2 cats and a Chihuahua and I used diatomaceous earth to keep away little crawly demons and this vacuum immediately died but I waited too long to return it. Don't be like me kids, get a different vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, Poor cleaning head
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this machine two stars because it's a pain to use! The suction is great! But he problem is, you have to stop every two minutes to take the plate off the back and suction that end of the tube!! We have pets and the hair builds up every 2 minutes (with daily vacuuming). If the cleaning head of the machine was perhaps a bit larger, or the tube it may work better. Suction is great! But its time consuming to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clunky
customer_reviews.text: the suction is good, but it is too clunky, the handle is too heavy, and the wheels dont move so you draft it on the floor without the wheels moving, the cord is too short, and your hair gets wrapped around the motorized brush the pros: easy to empty good suction
customer_reviews.author: MJ

product_meta.title: Bissell Powergroom Multicyclonic Bagless Canister Vacuum - Corded - 1654
product_meta.description: With the Bissell PowerGroom multi-cyclonic you have a powerful, maneuverable canister vacuum that makes cleaning and effortless task. The compact design and motorized brush roll helps lift embedded dirt and hair from your hard floor and carpeted surfaces. The telescoping wand allows you to comfortably maneuver around and under furniture and also easily clean hard to reach areas such as drapes and ceilings. The telescoping wand also features fingertip variable suction and brush roll on/off controls to easily transition from hard floors to carpets. With the power of 15x multi-cyclonic technology, you have excellent suction for longer to get the job done. When you are finished the cord will automatically Rewind with the Press of a button.
feature_bullets: Dirt cup capacity - 2 liters. Motorized brush roll for outstanding pickup of dirt, hair and other debris across carpets and scatter free cleaning on hard floors
15x Multi-cyclonic technology provides excellent suction and keeps your filters cleaner for longer
Easy empty dirt tank designed for easy disposal of dirt and debris
Fingertip controls provide convenient access to the brush roll on/off and variable suction to easily transition from carpet to hard floors
For true versatility of cleaning a dusting brush, upholstery and crevice tool are Included to remove pet hair, dirt and other debris from hard to reach places

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars336 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Vacuum Base^Vacuum Hose^Vacuum Foot^Vacuum Filter^Vacuum Tools
